DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the year in which immunotherapy began.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Therapy that designed to induce changes of patient's immune status in treatment of disease. The concept encompassing various treatment modalities including active and passive immunization, treatment with immunopotentiators, immunosuppressants and nonspecific systemic immunostimulators and adjuvants, desensitization to any allergens, bone marrow transplantation, thymus implantation._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Therapy that designed to induce changes of patient's immune status in treatment of disease. The concept encompassing various treatment modalities including active and passive immunization, treatment with immunopotentiators, immunosuppressants and nonspecific systemic immunostimulators and adjuvants, desensitization to any allergens, bone marrow transplantation, thymus implantation.

Concepts.definition: Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: Reviewed and approved for Release by TCGA team on 1/8/2010
